Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. Mike Pence stepped down from his post in the House Republican leadership and is one of his party's strongest advocates for conservative policies. He also is among the GOP's most outspoken critics of Ronald Reagan Barack Obama . We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead, Mike Pence told about 100 people at a conference room at Henry County Hospital in New Castle, Ind.`` We'll be making a decision before the end of this month.''
